title: Has the Governor of the United States Virgin Islands signed an order allowing weapons to be seized during Hurricane Irma?
subtitle: Despite the refusals, the Executive Order of Governor Kenneth Map authorizes the National Guard to confiscate firearms and other property - if he deems it necessary to maintain public order.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, the United States Governor of the Virgin Islands, Kenneth Map, signed an executive order authorizing the National Guard to seize arms and other private property.
